0: Agitators organize on behalf of various causes, handing out leaflets, giving rousing speeches, and stirring up the populace.
1: Bailiffs are manorial officials in the service of Noble Lords.
2: The rich and powerful use Bodyguards to protect themselves from thieves and common riffraff.
